Events that occurred on 17 May.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1936 - Swedish author and interviewer Lars Gustafsson is born.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Henry Willink.
1961 â€“ Singer Enya is born.
1981 - The eleventh episode of the 1981 radio adaptation of The Lord of the Rings is aired on BBC Radio 4.
2007 - New Zealand actor Noel Appleby dies.
